member.name: IProfferService.ProfferService
member.summary: Makes a service available to other objects on the same host.
member.param: A value of type GUID that specifies the service being offered.
A pointer to an IServiceProvider interface.
A pointer to a DWORD that receives an implementation-defined value used for identification purposes. The calling application must keep track of this value for possible use in .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IProfferService.RevokeService
member.summary: Makes a service unavailable that had previously been available to other objects through .
member.param: A value of type DWORD that specifies an implementation-defined value used for identification purposes. The calling application receives this value from .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IProfferService
member.summary: Exposes a general mechanism for objects to offer services to other objects on the same host.
